sentence.Network_en: George showed me to the guestroom which, he said, was rarely used.
sentence.Network_cn: 乔治带我去了客房, 他说, 那很少有人用.

sentence.Network_en: Please make the guestroom ready for our visitors.
sentence.Network_cn: 请为我们的客人们准备好房间.

sentence.Network_en: Sweep the floor in the guestroom.
